long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ² Idle Dice is Here! ğŸ²

Idle Dice expands on the gameplay of its predecessor and adds even more exciting features:

ğŸ² MORE DICE
Upgrade up to 25 dice independently for endless fun!

ğŸƒ MORE CARDS
The basic set of cards is too boring for you? Idle Dice 2 features cards that don't exist in the real world. Why limit yourself to 13 cards when you could draw the whole alphabet?

ğŸƒ CREATE YOUR DECK
Choose which cards to add to your deck and master various challenges!

ğŸ’¯ FAIR PLAY
Like all my games, watching ads is entirely optional and the game is balanced so you can progress without spending money.

ğŸŒ™ DARK MODE
The most requested feature for Idle Dice 1 is finally here!!

The game is still being developed, and more content will be added. Be part of the development by joining the Discord server and giving your feedback.

Let's roll into a new adventure! ğŸ²âœ¨
